author: USA TODAY, Kim Hjelmgaard, USA TODAY
title: Analysis: Trump halts funding to WHO. Experts say we need it now more than ever
description: The U.S. stops funding to the WHO for up to 90 days, the latest Trump administration move in its war on multilateralism amid the coronavirus outbreak.
content:
In the middle of the worst global pandemic in decades, President Donald Trump halted funding to the World Health Organization Tuesday while his administration investigates what he called the health body's "severe" mismanagement of its coronavirus response.
